numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graphs are shown at the top of the article.
2. I noticed that the percentage of diversity among coaches in major sports leagues is much lower than the percentage of diversity among players in these leagues.
3. Coaches often keep their jobs for a very long time.
4. Players often keep their jobs for a shorter time than coaches.
5. This difference may be a cause of the low diversity among coaches.
6. I wonder why the study excluded the National Basketball Association.
7. I wonder why the study excluded the National Hockey League.
8. The NBA has a very high percentage of diversity among players.
9. The NBA has a very low percentage of diversity among coaches.
10. The NHL has 43 professional players who are of color.
11. The NHL has more than 620 players.
12. The NHL is not diverse.
13. The NHL would be a good contradiction to the graphs.
14. This issue has a large impact on me and my community.
15. I come from a city that has very little diversity.
16. When I played sports, most of my teams were predominantly white.
17. When I played sports, most of my coaches were predominantly white.
18. The community has a lack of diversity.
19. The lack of diversity in the community is reflected in the sports that we play.
20. The graphs depict a gap between the diversity of players and the diversity of coaches in large national sports.
21. My alternative title is: Diversity on the field, similarity on the sideline.
